channel.title: xylem | Gordon Beeming
channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: Making a Cake Day
item.description: Today I decided to record a presentation I did recently. It will be posted soon but in the meantime here's something else. While I was busy recording my wife (Tiani) decided that her and the kids would make a cake. It was as usual one of the best cakes I've tasted. If you haven't seen any of her other creations take a look at her Facebook page3 Tiers Novalty Cakes, below is my cake for my 25th birthday cake.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: A journey worth taking
item.description: The post is going to go over the last 10 years (7 in more detail) and how I applied a little self control (eventually) and have sort of changed how I motivate myself to try better and why I came to do that. You can almost think of the journey as being a good movie where the dude in high school has everything, somehow loses it (well finding other great things) and then finds his way again (sort of).
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
